G4161-d-07-03-97-WC.Narrative: WC YARD JOB - Y0175-03, WAS PULLING OUT OF THE YARD AND HAD STOPPED AT THE ABSOLUTE SIGNAL TO WAIT FOR THE OKAY TO PROCEED.  WHEN THE CREW GOT THE OKAY, THEY PROCEEDED FORWARD APPROX. 5 CAR LENGTHS WHEN THE TRAIN WENT INTO EMERGENCY.  THE CREW FOUND THAT CAR, WTTX 961075, HAD DERAILED AND THE LOADEDTRAILER HAD FALLEN OFF THE FLATBED AND DOWN AN EMBANKMENT.  THE TRAILER CAUSED EXTENSIVE DAMAGE TOTHE CSX'S SWITCH AND JUNCTION BOX.  INVESTIGATION OF THE INCIDENT HAS REVEALED THE CAUSE TO BE DUE TO A SHIFTED LOAD IN THE TRAILER WHICH CAUSED THE REAR END, WHICH WAS EMPTY, OF THE FLATCAR TO LIFT UP ONTO THE RAIL AND DERAIL SENDING THE TRAILER DOWN THE EMBANKMENT.  NO MECHANICAL DEFECT, TRACK DEFECT OR HUMAN FAILURE WAS THE CAUSE OF THIS INCIDENT.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

97075-d-07-07-97-ARR.Primary Accident Cause: Shoving movement, absence of man on or at leading end of movement
97075-d-07-07-97-ARR.Accident Cause: Shoving movement, absence of man on or at leading end of movement
97075-d-07-07-97-ARR.Narrative: THE TRAIN HAD ENTERED THE WILDER LOOP WITH THE ENGINES HEADING OVER THE PIT FIRST AND PROCEEDING AROUND THE LOOP IN A COUNTERCLOCKWISE DIRECTION AND SPOTTED THE LAST CAR FOR DUMPING OVER THE PIT.  THECREW DUMPED 12 CARS WITH THE ENGINEER SHOVING IN REVERSE IN A CLOCKWISE DIRECTION.  THE CREW THEN SHOVED THESE 12 CARS AND THE CABOOSE TO CLEAR THE INNER LOOP SWITCH BY THE DUMP SITE.  THEY THEN PULLED FORWARD, SPOTTED THE LAST CAR OF THAT CUT FOR DUMPING AND LINED THE SWITCH FOR THE INNER LOOP.  THEY DUMPED THE REMAINING CARS WITH THE ENGINEER SHOVING IN REVERSE AROUND THE LOOP.  IT WAS AT THISTIME THAT THE INNER LOOP SWITCH ON THE FAR SIDE OF THE LOOP WAS RUN THROUGH.  UPON COMPLETION OF DUMPING THE ENGINEER WAS INSTRUCTED TO TAKE THEM AHEAD AND ACCORDING TO EVENT RECORDER, MOVED FORWARD 320 FEET BEFORE COMING TO A STOP.  THIS DISTANCE COINCIDES WITH THE LENGTH OF DERAILMENT CARS.  CONDUCTOR IS TAKING FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR THIS DERAILMENT.  HE CONCEDED THAT HE DID NOT RIDE THE POINTAND SHOULD HAVE BEEN IN POSITION TO LINE THE SWITCH WHICH WOULD HAVE PREVENTED THE CARS FROM DERAILING.  ADMITTEDLY, HE WAS IN THE DUMPSHACK AND OUT OF POSITION.  HE IS IN VIOLATION OF GCOR RULE 8.2 POSITION OF SWITCHES AND 8.15 SWITCHES RUN THROUGH.  SEE ATTACHED DIAGRAMS.NoneNone
